description:
Kicking rocks, walking on a white line... Sakamoto makes even looks stylish playing such silly after-school games. Three young boys see him and follow him, undaunted. Despite their initial sense of rivalry, the boys find themselves increasingly drawn to Sakamoto... when suddenly, an obstacle stands in their path!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Gekou no Rule / Camera-goshi no Koi / Shokudou Marketing
Rules for Leaving School / Love Through the Camera Lens / Cafeteria Marketing
下校のルール / カメラ越しの恋 / 食堂マーケティング
